res.name: Light's Hammer
res.location: Found in Stormgarde Crypt. Enter Stormgarde. Go under the overpass. Go Right - Enter the human area.. GO Right... back over the overpass. Stay to the right and you will find the crypt. It's down there.

res.name: Execution Sentence
res.location: Durnholde Keep gallows

res.name: Twist of Faith
res.location: Brother Anton, Nijel's Point, Desolace

res.name: Hammerstorm
res.location: Hearthglen, Tyr's Hand

res.name: Holy Templar
res.location: Fight Forgetful Paladin in south east desolace (he's fighting a bunch of undead)

res.name: Divine Steed
res.location: Divine Steed elite horse running around Badlands

res.name: Light of the Guardian
res.location: Shadowprey Village in Desolace, talk to Brother Notran

res.name: Crimson Defense
res.location: Loot from elites in Hearthglen

res.name: Protection Mastery
res.location: Ruins of Alterac, Church in the first left corner as you enter.

res.name: Blessing of the Divines
res.location: book in the corner of the scarlet monastery exterior

res.name: Glimmer of Light
res.location: Duskwood 43,67. Desolace interactable yellow crystal north west.

res.name: Holy Mastery
res.location: Theramore Graveyard, Tome of Mastery lootable

res.name: One With The Light
res.location: Father Gavin in Dun Morough right by Misty Pine Refuge

res.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
res.location: EPL - Little statue on the back-left side of the gate before undead area outside Strat Undead

res.name: Retribution Mastery
res.location: Arathi Highlands, Stormgarde Chapel. Enter, first corner to the right. Beware if Horde - you will have to corpserun.

res.name: Crusader of the Light
res.location: Anvil middle of Iron Forge

res.name: Consecrated Weapon
res.location: Tirisfal Glades -North of farm to the east. Speak with the Infected Crusader

res.name: Crusader's Judgement
res.location: Lootable book in Stormgarde Keep

res.name: Swift Execution
res.location: EPL - Tyr's Hand to the south

res.name: Branding Zeal
res.location: Hearthglen

res.name: Execution Verdict
res.location: EPL - Tyr's Hand. go into the area its in a nook on the right. A little RPG element plays out.

res.name: Consecrated Zeal
res.location: Hearthglen

res.name: Divine Reprieve
res.location: Underwater a drowned paladin west of Auberdine in Darkshore

res.name: Fierce Vengeance
res.location: Tyr's Hand - Scarlet Praetorian

res.name: Pious Strikes
res.location: EPL: Tyr's Hand the first building on the right at the very top. book on the ledge next to the elite

res.name: Synergistic Light
res.location: Blasted Lands, Dark Portal. Loot both Horde and Alliance invasion plans from the tents, and combine them.

res.name: A New Dawn
res.location: Southshore graveyard

res.name: Spark of Hope
res.location: Mirkfallon Lake, Stonetalon. Middle of the lake, lootable Spark on the ground (?)

res.name: Light of Dawn
res.location: Swamp of Sorrows, The Harborage. Enter the tent on the left side as you arrive. Not inaccessible to Horde, but it might require a corpserun.

res.name: Baleful Hammer
res.location: WPL - Above western farm

res.name: Righteous Verdict
res.location: Pick up in Stormgarde Keep

res.name: Sword of Vengeance
res.location: Wetlands - Waterfall all the way in the south. Bloodmyst Isle - Malestra Dusksoul by The Vector Coil in the west. Hinterlands rock middle of lake to the north.

res.name: Swift Avenger
res.location: Winterspring: Talk to Captain Dawnmarch a little south of Everlook

res.name: Armor of Wrath
res.location: In Undercity (when you get in, go under the stairs on the left, in the passage.)

res.name: Sacred Light
res.location: Alterac Mountains graveyard. Stand behind the main gravestone, click on a small, little button. This creates a Sacred Light NPC. Target it, then type /pray.

res.name: Wrathful Exorcism
res.location: Highlord Taelan Fordring Hearthglen

res.name: Divine Resurgence
res.location: Stratholme Main Entrance, right side, looted from the Flower of Regret

res.name: Divine Sacrifice
res.location: Tyr's Hand bookcase building to the north

res.name: Blessed Hammer
res.location: EPL - Crusader chest north of Corin's Crossing

res.name: Divine Order
res.location: Behind Kara in the Chapel. Spawns on the bench on the right.

res.name: Shield of Wrath
res.location: WPL - Hearthglen lootable in chapel

res.name: Protection Mastery
res.location: Alterac Mountains in house where Targ is

res.name: Gladiator
res.location: STV Arena quests

res.name: Holy Mastery
res.location: Theramore on the Left side before you enter the City

res.name: Void Herald: Whispers of the Old Gods
Light at the End of the Tunnel
Void Herald: Madness of the Old Gods
